oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Special requisition for clothing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capt. Robert H. Clinton, Co. F, 1st Mid. Tenn. (later 10th Tenn.) Inf., USA, received this requisition for trousers, shoes, hats, feathers and bugle and eagle pins for hats Buchanan's Branch Tenn. of Robert Gutterman, Regt. Quartermaster, U.S. Volunteer Army. Thirty-five pairs of stockings were scratched out as not received on the list.
